QuestData.Title: Devoured
QuestData.Description: We knew this was a possibility, but we had no idea how the beast would defend itself. Iso'rath's body is reacting quickly to our threat.$B$BI can complete the summoning from here, but only if you can hold back Iso'rath's defenses. Keep them busy! We will survive this!
QuestData.LogDescription: Defend yourself and Earthcaller Yevaa from Iso'rath's bodily defenses.
QuestData.RewardText: I've brought you back from the brink of death, hero!$B$BDeathwing is upon us! We need your help.
